[ar:5 Seconds Of Summer]

[00:00.00]Easier - 5 Seconds Of Summer
[00:02.08]Lyrics by：5 Seconds Of Summer/Andrew Wotman/Ali Tamposi/Louis Bell/Ryan Tedder/Charlie Puth
[00:04.16]Composed by：5 Seconds Of Summer/Andrew Wotman/Ali Tamposi/Louis Bell/Ryan Tedder/Charlie Puth
[00:06.25]Is it easier to stay Is it easier to go
[00:09.13]I don't wanna know oh
[00:10.98]But I know that I'm never ever gonna change
[00:13.68]And you know you don't want it any other way
[00:17.56]Why do we always gotta run away
[00:20.17]And we wind up in the same place
[00:22.63]It's like we're looking for the same thing
[00:25.25]Same thing yeah
[00:27.85]Yeah do we really gotta do this now
[00:31.41]Right here with all your friends around
[00:34.01]In the morning we can work it out
[00:36.42]Work it out
[00:38.32]I love you so much that I hate you
[00:42.42]Right now it's so hard to blame you
[00:45.07]'Cause you're so damn beautiful
[00:47.71]You're so damn beautiful
[00:49.61]Is it easier to stay Is it easier to go
[00:52.70]I don't wanna know oh
[00:54.67]But I know that I'm never ever gonna change
[00:57.28]And you know that you're always gonna stay the same
[01:00.05]Is it easier to stay Is it easier to go
[01:03.55]I don't wanna know oh
[01:05.48]But I know that I'm never ever gonna change
[01:08.13]And you know you don't want it any other way
[01:11.69]Every time that you say you're gonna leave
[01:14.34]That's when you get the very best of me
[01:17.33]You know we need it like the air we breathe
[01:19.95]Air we breathe yeah
[01:22.12]I love you so much that I hate you
[01:25.44]Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:26.36]Right now it's so hard to blame you Oh
[01:28.47]'Cause you're so damn beautiful Oh
[01:31.13]You're so damn beautiful Oh-oh oh-oh
[01:33.00]Is it easier to stay Is it easier to go
[01:36.16]I don't wanna know oh
[01:37.98]But I know that I'm never ever gonna change
[01:41.00]And you know that you're always gonna stay the same
[01:43.94]Is it easier to stay Is it easier to go
[01:47.04]I don't wanna know oh I don't wanna know
[01:49.87]But I know that I'm never ever gonna change
[01:51.93]And you know you don't want it any other way
[01:54.63]The hardest part of all
[01:58.51]Da-da-da-dum-da-da
[02:00.11]Is that we're only built to fall
[02:02.85]Is it any easier
[02:06.09]Is it easier to stay Is it easier to go
[02:09.07]I don't wanna know oh Oh-oh
[02:11.00]But I know that I'm never ever gonna change
[02:13.61]And you know that you're always gonna stay the same Is it easier
[02:16.69]Is it easier to stay Is it easier to go Yeah
[02:19.90]I don't wanna know oh Oh
[02:21.85]But I know that I'm never ever gonna change
[02:24.46]And you know you don't want it any other way
[02:27.56]I love you so much that I hate you
[02:31.18]Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:32.21]Right now it's so hard to blame you
[02:34.02]'Cause you're so damn beautiful
data.trans:
[ti:Easier]
[ar:5 Seconds Of Summer]
[al:Easier]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.08]//
[00:04.16]//
[00:06.25]留下更容易 还是离开更容易
[00:09.13]我不想知道
[00:10.98]但我知道我永远不会改变
[00:13.68]你知道 你也不想有任何变化
[00:17.56]为什么我们总是逃避
[00:20.17]到最后 我们回到原地
[00:22.63]似乎我们在寻觅同样的东西
[00:25.25]同样的东西
[00:27.85]现在我们真的要这样做吗
[00:31.41]此时此刻 你所有的朋友都在身旁
[00:34.01]明天早上 我们就能解决问题
[00:36.42]解决问题
[00:38.32]我爱你 爱到无法自拔
[00:42.42]此时此刻 不能责怪你
[00:45.07]因为你真的太美丽
[00:47.71]你真的太美丽
[00:49.61]留下更容易 还是离开更容易

[00:54.67]但我知道我永远不会改变
[00:57.28]你知道 你会始终如一

[01:11.69]每当你说你要离去
[01:14.34]那一刻 我就变成了最好的自己
[01:17.33]你知道我们需要爱情 它就像我们呼吸的空气
[01:19.95]我们呼吸的空气
[01:22.12]我爱你 爱到无法自拔
[01:25.44]//
